Su deseo es, que sus hijos que están en la casa puedan tener una educación mejor que la que él tuvo y  poderlos sacar adelante por medio del sacrificio  que incurre tener hijos estudiando, espera que sus hijos se preparen para que un día sean ellos los que le ayuden  en su vejez, todo esto lo logra con la bendición de Dios y su esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Jose, 48, studied until the sixth grade and got married at the age of 25. He and his wife, who takes care of the home, have four children. Two of them go to school and live with Jose and his wife, while the others live elsewhere.

Jose has been a farmer for over 20 years. From a young age, his father taught him that he would only live a good life if he worked honestly. When somebody needs help working, Jose also helps them. The distance he goes to work varies and is not always in the same place. When Jose harvests the crops, he sales part of them and the rest is for consumption. Nobody else is involved in the task and he works in the morning from 6:00 am to 12 noon. 

The project that he wants to pursue is the purchase of a calf, which would improve his activities and would increase his production. With this, he would have a higher income and would give him a step of development for him and his family. 

His dream is that his children that live at home can have a better education than he had and that he can improve their lives through the sacrifice incurred by having children who study. He hopes that his children prepare for a day that they help him in his old age. All of this is attainable with the blessing of God and effort.

loans.use: to buy a calf.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her children's education.

loans.name: Latika

texts.en:
Latika is a housewife from the small town of Maynaguri in Jalpaiguri district. She lives with her husband and two children in a kaccha (made of stone and straw) house. Her husband is involved in farming and cultivates many kinds of vegetables to sell in the village market.

They both are illiterate and can only sign their names. Their children are too small to go to school. Due to their low income, Latika is unable to manage her family expenses together with her children’s educational expenses. Her husband is struggling as best he can all  day but fails to make more income than expected, so Latika requested BJS (Kiva’s Partner) for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for cultivation of mustard in the same field to enhance the family income. She is very ambitious and hopeful that she will succeed in her target for more income. She dreams that she will purchase more farmlands with her business profit in future. 

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva for the loan.

loans.use: To purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for cultivation of mustard.

loans.name: Bharati

texts.en:
Bharati is a housewife from the small townof Maynaguri in Jalpaiguri district. She lives with her husband and two children in a kaccha house (made of mud, bamboo and straw). Her husband has been involved in farming for many years and cultivates many kinds of vegetables and sells them in the village market.

They both are illiterate and can only sign their names but their children are still studying in a village school in higher level. Due to their low income, Bharati is unable to manage her family expenses as well as her children’s educational expenses. Her husband is struggling as best he can all day but fails to make more income than expected, so Bharati requested BJS (Kiva’s Partner) for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for cultivation of mustard in the same field to enhance the family income. She is very much ambitious and hopeful that she will succeed in her target for more income. She dreams that she will purchase more farmlands with her business profit in future. 

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva for making her self–sufficient.

loans.use: To purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for cultivation of mustard.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en:
Rina is a housewife from the small town of Dhupguri in Jalpaiguri district. She lives with her husband and three children in a small house. Her husband is involved in farming and cultivates many kinds of vegetables to sell in the village market.

They both have read up to grade four but their children are still studying in a village school. Due to their low income, Rina is unable to manage her family expenses as well as her children’s educational expenses. Her Husband is struggling hard all day but fails to make more income than expected, so Rina requested a loan from BJS (Kiva’s Partner) to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for cultivating mustard in the same field to enhance the family income. She is very much ambitious and hopeful that she will succeed in her goal to earn more income. She dreams that she will purchase more farmland with her business profit in the future.
 
She is thankful to BJS and Kiva for making her self–sufficient.

loans.use: To purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to cultivate mustard.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy another machine, air-conditioner  and fabric.

loans.name: Jayanti

texts.en:
Jayanti is a 46-year-old married woman with two children. Her husband is 46 years old. Jayanti is illiterate and able to sign only her name. Her husband completed his education up to grade 10. 

Her husband has a small business but his income is not enough. Providing education for two children and running a household is very difficult for them, so Jayanti decided to do something so that she can earn money and contribute to her family. In her childhood, she learned stitching and knitting, so she thought of doing this as her business for now. She thought of buying a sewing machine so that she could improve her skills and earn money. For this reason, she has applied for a loan to BJS (Kiva’s partner) and she has already started to take orders for preparing dresses. She hopes she will succeed in her life and be able to purchase more sewing machines to enhance her own dressmaking business and make more profit.

She is grateful to BJS and Kiva for giving her this great support to enhance her business.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine for her new dressmaking business

loans.name: Jesús Arsenio

texts.es:
Jesús de 38 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado en la escuela, por la mentalidad de sus padres y la necesidad de ingresos al hogar no pudo seguir estudiando, está acompañado, ha  procreado tres hijos, sus pareja  se dedica a los oficios domésticos, sus tres hijos viven con ellos, están en la escuela, nadie más vive con ellos, solo su familia depende de los ingresos que genera Jesús.

Él es agricultor, pero actualmente es vigilante de seguridad en un supermercado, actividad que la realiza desde hace dos años, antes se dedicaba solo a la agricultura.  La distancia que recorre hacia el trabajo es de unos 10 km, una parte lo recorre en bicicleta y la otra en bus, su horario de trabajo es de las 7am a 5 pm.
 

Jesús  quiere terminar uno pozo subterráneo que ha iniciado, el cual es el que le servirá para obtener el agua que necesita a diario, ya que en la zona donde vive es bastante escaza el vital líquido. 

Sus sueños son el que su familia cada vez viva más cómoda y poder tener el agua en su casa y con esto beneficiara todas las labores que realiza a diario su esposa, ya que no le tocara movilizarse hasta el rio donde siempre les ha tocado ir.
texts.en:
Jesús, 38, went to school through the 4th grade.  Because of his parents' health and the need for household income he was not able to go farther.  He has a common-law wife and three children.  His partner works as a housekeeper.  His three children live with them and are in school.  No one else lives with them, just the family members who are dependent on Jesús's income.  

Jesús is a farmer, but he currently works as a security guard at a supermarket, which he's been doing for two years.  He previously worked only in agriculture.  He travels around 10km to work, one part by bike and the other by bus.  His work schedule runs from 7AM to 5PM.  

Jesús wants to finish an underground well he started.  It will be used to provide the water he needs daily because the area he lives in sorely lacks the vital liquid.  

Jesús's dream is that his family live more and more comfortably and that his house have water.  The water will benefit everything his wife does on a daily basis, because she won't have to travel to the river like she has always had to.

loans.use: to finish an underground well.

loans.name: Chanchala

texts.en:
Chanchala is only 26 years old. She is married to Khudiram and is a housewife.  They live in the small town of Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri in their own house.  Chanchala has a secondary education and her husband attended school up to grade 8. They don't have any children.

Chanchala 's husband is a jewelry trader. He prepares different types of ornaments and jewelry made of different metals and sells them at the market and in his neighborhood.  The products he sells are very popular in his locality, especially among women, who usually come to buy new jewelry from him.  His products are all made of different metals like silver, brass, copper, and bronze. As he has about 15 years of experience in this field, he is doing well in his business also thanks to the  effort he puts into his work.

 He would like to diversify the products such as earrings, bracelets, rings, bangles and more. But he can't save much money from his income after covering their household expenses.

Chanchala is a hardworking and enterprising lady.  She wants to help her husband in his business. So she has taken out a loan from BJS to purchase different varieties of metal from the wholesale market.  It will help to expand their business so they will be able to earn more profit to fulfill their dreams.

Chanchala is grateful to her lenders for the loan and gives her thanks to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase different varieties of metal for expanding her husband's jewelry business.

loans.name: Ladislao

texts.es:
El  señor Ladislao de 47 años de edad,  estudio hasta sexto grado, se casó a la edad de los veinte y cinco  años, ha procreo dos  hijos con su pareja;  su esposa es ama de casa, ella es la que se encarga de las labores del hogar, sus dos hijos viven con él, trabajan en la ciudad en un taller de mecánica.

Él es agricultor, tiene más de veinte años de realizar la actividad, su padre desde pequeño le enseño; también posee un camión de carga, el cual le genera ingresos ya que trabaja con una ferretería cuando hay trabajo, cuando alguien lo busca que le ayude a trabajar también lo hace.  La distancia que recorre es variable ya que no siempre va al mismo lugar, cuando saca la cosecha una parte la vende y lo demás para el consumo, nadie más se involucra en la actividad, el trabajo lo hace por la mañana de 6:00 am a 12:00 md.


El proyecto que realizara es compra de llantas para el camión, con el que trabaja casi toda la época de invierno, con el préstamo podrá comprar las llantas y así poder seguir trabajando. 


El sueño más deseado es poder seguir trabajando, siempre que su estado de salud se lo permita, espera que sus hijos al igual que él sean personas de bien. Con las ganancias que la actividad le produzca, un porcentaje será para el pago de la cuota del préstamo y lo de más en inversión en su casa.
texts.en:
Ladislao is 47 years old. He attended school until sixth grade and got married when he was 25 years old. He and his wife have two children. His wife is a homemaker and she is the one who performs household activities. Their two children live with them and work in the city in a mechanic shop. 

He is a farmer and has been working in this area for more than 20 years. His parents taught him the business when he was young. He also has a cargo truck, which generates income since he works with a hardware store when they have work for him. Whenever someone is looking for someone to help with work, he does it. The distance that he covers varies since he does not always go to the same place. 

When he harvests his crops, he sells some and keeps the rest to consume. Nobody else helps him with this activity; he does it on his own from 6:00 am until 12:00 noon. 

The project that he would like to complete is purchasing tires for his truck, with which he will work during almost the entire winter season. With the loan, he will be able to purchase the tires so that he can continue to work.

His greatest dream is to be able to continue to work and that his health will allow him to do so. He hopes that his children will be good people like him. With the earnings from his business, he will pay back the loan and use the rest to invest in his home.

loans.use: to purchase tires for his truck.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
Luisa de 57 años de edad,  estudio hasta cuarto grado, es casada su pareja trabaja en la agricultura, de tres hijos que tubo, solo una vive con ella, la que le ayuda con los quehaceres del hogar.
El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar materiales de construcción para construir un muro de contención en su casa, ya que cada vez que llega el invierno se le va derrumbando. No tiene una actividad económica a la que se dedique, por lo que solo apoya a su esposo en tenerle preparado todo lo que necesita para salir al trabajo.

Los sueños para sus hijos es poder dejarles una casa preparada, espera tener a todos sus hijos algún día reunidos junto a ellos como cuando eran pequeños.
texts.en:
Luisa, 57, studied through the fourth grade, is married, and her husband works in agriculture. They have three children and one lives with Luisa and her husband and helps with tasks around the home.

The loan that she is asking for is to buy the construction materials needed to build a retaining wall for her house because every time that winter comes the wall falls apart. Luisa does not have any economic activities to devote herself to so she helps her husband prepare everything he needs to head out to work.

Luisa's dream for her children is to be able to leave them a prepared house. She hopes to one day have all her children reunited just like it used to be when they were young.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a retaining wall for her house.

loans.name: Estefania

texts.es:
Estefanía es una persona responsable y eficiente, termino los estudios en el 2012  en el Colegio Mixto ciudadanos del futuro y en la educación siempre ha tenido dedicación y esfuerzo con las actividades que realiza. Al salir obtuvo la oportunidad de estudiar un pre universitario le fue muy bien y quiso empezar los estudios para llegar a ser profesional  y salir adelante dedicarse a los estudios para cumplir los sueños.
 La rama de la salud es algo que a ella le gusta mucho, con gran esfuerzo logro ingresar al instituto y decidió empezar por el curso de auxiliar administración en salud por el gusto y por el buen campo laboral, en el primer semestre se  desenvolvió mucho con los temas,  es muy atenta y le gusta colaborar con la comunidad. Desea adquirir muchos más conocimientos, el empeño la ha llevado al lugar que esta aferrándose más a las oportunidades que se le presentan con tal animo para demostrar un buen desempeño tanto, en lo  laboral como en lo académico, ya que ella es una persona muy decidida.
Le comentaron cerca del convenio de kiva que tiene la institución para poyar a los estudiantes que como ella no cuentan con el dinero suficiente para poder pagar completas las mensualidades por los problemas económicos en los que se encuentra, ella esta ayuda le parece muy buena y estaría muy contenta si queda favorecida para el convenio.
texts.en:
Estefanía is a responsible and efficient person. She finished school in 2012 at the Colegio Mixto Ciudadanos del Futuro [a co-ed k-12 school]. She has always been dedicated to her education and has put a lot of effort into the things she does. Upon finishing school she got the opportunity to study at a university prep. It went very well so she wanted to start studying to become a professional, get ahead, and commit herself to her studies to achieve her dreams.

She really likes the health field a lot. With a lot of effort she was able to get into the institute and she decided to start studying a course in health assistant administration because she liked it and because it is a good field of work. During the first semester she got along really well with the material. She is very attentive and she likes to collaborate with her community. She wants to learn a lot more. Her drive has gotten her where she is and she is embracing with great spirit, the opportunities that she is presented with demonstrating great working and academic performance. She is a very determined person.

She was made aware of the partnership that the institution has with Kiva to support students. She does not have enough money to be able to make the monthly payments in full due to financial problems. She thinks this helps seems very good and she would be very happy if she is selected for the program.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of enrollment.

loans.name: Etifa

texts.en:
Etifa is a 42-year-old housewife and there are five members in her family, herself, her husband, and three children.  Her husband Asak is 47 years old and engaged in cultivation. Both Etifa and her husband are illiterate and can only sign their names.  All of their children (one son and two daughters) are receiving education and they are in grades 10, 9 and 7 respectively. They live in the small village of Baroghoria in the district of Jalpaiguri .They have their own kachha house (straw and mud-made).

They are from a humble family of scarce economic resources, which is why Etifa's husband cultivates different crops in their own piece of land. He has been working in agriculture for many years and produces beans, onions and other vegetables for the family's consumption and sells some of his produce in the local markets.

The small income of Etifa's husband is not sufficient to get over the financial hurdles of their family, so they decided to cultivate potatoes in their land. For this she needs capital, which they don't have.  So she applied for a loan from BJS for purchasing potato seeds and fertilizers.  She hopes the profit which will be generated from their business will meet the financial needs of their family as well as help her to give her children better education.

She hopes to purchase a cycle van in future to rent it out for another means of income.

Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase potato seeds and fertilizers for cultivating potatoes.

loans.name: Adan

texts.es:
Adán tiene 53 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío Playa Grande, una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad que se caracteriza por sus paisajes verdes, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la ganadería y agricultura especialmente al cultivo de cafeto de la variedad catimor, comercializando el ganado vacuno en la plaza de ganado de su comunidad, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de toretes para posteriormente engordarlos y ofrecerlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Adan, 53, lives with his wife and children in the Caserio Playa Grande. It is a rural area of the district of Santo Tomas in the province of Cutervo, which is a district known for its green landscapes and has a population that works in agriculture, trade and livestock. Cutervo is part of the Region Cajamarca in the northern highlands of Peru.

He works in livestock and agriculture, especially the cultivation of catimor coffee and the selling of cattle in the livestock plaza of his community. He is asking for this loan of 3000 nuevos soles to buy steer to fatten and then sell at a higher price.

loans.use: to buy steer to fatten and then sell them at a higher price.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
La Señora María Elena, es madre de cuatro hijos y se dedica  a la venta de bisutería  de forma ambulante  desde hace 15 años,  ella realiza esta labor para llevar  el sustento de su familia. 

Doña María Elena  se traslada a su puesto de trabajo a las 6:00 am y abre su negocio a la 7 am,  finalizando a las 12:00 pm de lunes a domingo.
  
El  crédito que  solicito a Ceprodel lo utilizo  para compra camisolines, calcetines, camiseta, tobillera y camisas de uniforme para ofertarle a sus clientela  y así aprovechar la entrada a  clase,   lo que ayudara a tener mayores venta  y a así lograr a obtener más   ganancia,  la que le permitirá   a realizar sus  sueños como es la compra de su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
María Elena has four children. She has made a living selling jewelry as a traveling saleswoman for 15 years. She does this work so that she can provide for her family.

María Elena goes to work at 6:00 a.m. and opens her business at 7:00 a.m. She finishes work at 12:00 p.m. from Monday to Sunday.

She has applied for a loan from Ceprodel to buy nightdresses, socks, shirts, ankle supports, and uniform shirts to offer to her clientele. She will then be able to take advantage of the return to school, which will help her to make more sales and earn a better income. This will allow her to make her dreams come true, such as buying her own home.

loans.use: to buy nightdresses, socks, shirts, ankle supports, and uniform shirts.

loans.name: Kabita

texts.en:
Kabita is only 24 years old and raising an only son with her husband.  She is married to Dashoroth who is 28 years old and a trader of leather bags. Both the husband and wife have secondary education.  Their son is still a child and below school-going age. They live in their own house in Dhupguri, in the district of Jalpaiguri.

Kabita's husband runs a shop where he sells different types of leather bags.  His income is so scanty that he is unable to manage his family expenses well. To provide another source of income for the family, Kabita has been involved in animal husbandry for five years.  Thanks to her hard work, today her business counts one dairy cow and three sheep.  In order to increase her income she needs to develop her business, and she needs financial support.

Kabita heard about BJS who give loans to rural women to start a new business.  So she has taken out  a loan from BJS.  She plans to purchase a dairy cow with the loan and to start a new business of milk products like curd, butter, paneer (cottage cheese), etc.  She also plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued business development and wants to give her son a better education so he will be successful in life.

She hopes to purchase a car in future to hire out for more income.

She is thankful to both BJS and Kiva for funding.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for her animal husbandry

loans.name: Madhabi

texts.en:
Madhabi is a housewife from the small town of Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. She lives with her husband and only school-going daughter, who is studying in grade 8.  Madhabi's husband, who is 35 years old, is associated with cultivation.  Both are uneducated and can only sign their names.

Madhabi is a housewife. Her husband is engaged in vegetable cultivation. He works hard to be able to earn a living.  They have a plot of land where they grow different seasonal vegetables. He currently needs to make some investments in his agricultural business in order to have it function in a sustainable way to give his family a better lifestyle.  A loan will be a big support to this hardworking woman and her family, enabling them to buy cucumber seeds and some fertilizers.

Madhabi has taken a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS. She hopes to earn a big profit from this business as the produce has a great demand in the market. Madhabi hopes that with the profit they will be able to achieve their goal of educating their daughter properly and giving a decent lifestyle to her family.

In future they want to cultivate tea and make a tea garden of their own.

They are very much grateful to their lenders BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase cucumber seeds and fertilizers for cultivation.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, es un hombre muy trabajador, desde hace 15 años trabaja en su pequeño taller de mecánica, con el cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante y poder sacar a delante a su hijo, ya que es su mayor motivación para salir adelante, a pesar que no vive con el por algunos motivos familiares.

Edgar está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar mercadería como repuestos, herramientas, entre otros; y de esta manear poder atender mejor a sus clientes y poder seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”
texts.en:
Edgar lives in the city of Pucallpa.  He is a very hardworking man who has worked in his small auto repair shop for the past 15 years.  Through this work, he is able to earn an income to get ahead and support his son.  His son is his motivation for getting ahead, even though he does not live with him due to some family issues.  

Edgar is grateful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help, he will be able to purchase merchandise such as spare parts, tools, and other items.  With these, he will be able to better serve his customers and continue to work to make his dream of having his own home a reality.

loans.use: purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is a 54-year-old married woman with four children, two of whom are still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Edna has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

She requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, seasonings, spices, etc. for her business.

In the future, Edna would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, seasonings, spices, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Moti

texts.en:
Moti is a 40-year-old woman.  She is from the village of East Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. She lives with her husband Mithu, aged 45 years, and their two sons.  Both of the parents are illiterate.  Their sons are in grade 10 and grade 9.  They live in their own kachha house (mud, straw and bamboo-made).  Moti is a homemaker and her husband is a cycle-van puller.

Moti's husband delivers goods and vegetables to the market shops in a cycle-van.  The villagers also use his van as a means of transport in the village and pay the travelling charges to him.  He hires and pays rent on a cycle-van from a local owner, so he is unable to make sufficient income.

Moti is requesting a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase their own cycle-van to generate more income. She has chosen this business because the demand for cycle vans is very high in their area.  Their high volume of work will create a steady income and will allow her to buy an auto-rickshaw from the profit of her business.

Moti has taking the loan from BJS to prove that it is not too difficult to overcome financial hurdles if financial assistance is received, and so that she can fulfill her dreams.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a cycle–van for business purposes.

loans.name: María Olimpia

texts.es:
María de 69 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, se casó a la edad de los veinte  años, el matrimonio no le duro mucho tiempo, procreo tres hijos con su pareja, los que ya son mayores de edad, dos de ellos viven en el extranjero y una hija que ya esta casada pero vive cerca de ella. Actualmente, vive con unas nietas las que cuida y están con ella siempre, sus hijos son los que la sostienen hoy en día. 


Ella no tiene ningún tipo de negocio, por lo que solo se dedica al cuido del hogar y de sus animales de corral, es la que se encarga de todos los quehaceres del hogar.

El préstamo será invertido en la ampliación de su casa, le agregara una  habitación más, la necesidad satisfecha será el poder ampliar más su casa.   

Ella planea que su casa cada vez verla mejor, lo que le dará satisfacción el ver todo lo que ha querido realizado, ya que nos expresa que mientras viva quiere tener las comodidades que no tubo cuando era joven.
texts.en:
Maria is 69 years old, and studied until sixth grade.  She got married at the age of 20, but the marriage did not last very long.  She had three children with her husband, and they are now all adults.  Two of them live outside of the country, and the other daughter is married but lives close to her.  Currently, she lives with some of her granddaughters, who she takes care of and are always with her.  Her children are who support her now.  She does not have a business, therefore she devotes her time to taking care of the house and her barnyard animals, as she is the one that is in charge of all of the household work.  

The loan will be used to expand her home by building an additional room to satisfy the need to expand the house.  She plans to continue to improve her home, giving her the satisfaction of seeing all of her wishes materialized.  She states that while she is alive, she wants to have the comforts that she was not able to have when she was younger.

loans.use: build an additional room in her home.

loans.name: Makerita

texts.en: Makerita is a 23-year-old a single woman with no children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, banana, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. Makerita has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives, an axe, etc for her farm. She has been a member of SBPD since 2013. With her profits,Makerita hopes her business will help improve her family living.

loans.use: to buy farming inputs

loans.name: Fonima Soso

texts.en: Fonima is a 23-year-old a single woman with no children. She has a small plantation and grows taamu, taro, banana, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. Fonima has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings, an axe, and other supplies for her business. She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. With her profits, she hopes to extend her business and save for unexpected emergencies.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Aoteatea

texts.en: Aoteatea is a 47-year-old married woman with 3 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, banana, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 6 years. Aoteatea has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives, filings, and an axe for her business improvement. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Aoteatea hopes to continue education for her children and also for a big profit from her business.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.es:
La socia Antonieta, sigue dedicándose a su negocio de restaurante, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia elabora diferentes tipos de platos como arroz con pollo, saltado, sopas entre otros, la socia trabaja todo los días para de esta forma la socia pueda continuar apoyando a su familia, la socia desea que su negocio crezca en el futuro.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como aceite, arroz, carnes entre otros.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio como arroz y aceite.
texts.en:
Antonieta continues to run her restaurant. She has worked for years in this business that brings both economic and personal rewards. Antonieta prepares different types of meals like chicken with rice, traditional stir fry and soups among other plates. She works everyday so that she can continue to support her family and hopes that her restaurant grows in the future. 

She is asking for this loan to buy supplies for her business like oil, rice, meat and more.

loans.use: to buy supplies like oil, rice, meat and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase equipment for his business.

loans.name: Mouena

texts.en: Mouena is a 47-year-old married woman with 8 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, banana, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 8 years. Mouena has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings, an axe, and other supplies. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Mouena hopes to improve her business and help her family financially.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Apeuta

texts.en: Apeuta is 52 years old and married with three children. She owns and operates a small store where she sells items such as sugar, flour, rice, soft drinks and other basics. She has been doing this for more than 10 years, and is requesting a loan to buy additional items to sell. She hopes to use her profits to expand her store and save for emergencies. She became a member of SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, flour, soft drinks and other items.

loans.name: Motu

texts.en: Motu is a 62-year-old married woman with 8 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro ,taamu, banana, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this more than 5 years. Motu has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings, an axe, and a wheelbarrow for her business. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Motu hopes to develop her business to help her family living.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: La Señora Cristina sigue con la misma actividad de venta de variedad de productos de uso doméstico, cuenta que le fue muy bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de mercadería como refrescos,  en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de lo mismo, refrescos y galletas al por mayor, se siente agradecida con kiva por otra oportunidad que le brindan para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sra. Cristina continues in the same business of selling various products for household use. She says that she did very well with her previous loan, which was used to buy merchandise, such as soft drinks.

On this occasion, she is requesting a loan in order to buy the same items, including soft drinks and cookies in bulk. Cristina is grateful to Kiva for another opportunity that has been given to her to improve her business and her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and cookies in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio continua dedicándose a su negocio de restaurante, él socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa ya son años que se dedican a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio a la vez continua con su agrupación musical trabajando en los distintos compromisos que solicitan sus servicios, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como aceite, arroz entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido  por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues with his restaurant business.  The member has been working together with his wife for years in this business.  It is going well for him thanks to the determination that he puts into his business every day.  The member continues with his musical group working at different commitments where they request their services.  The member is a responsible and diligent person.  This is the way that he gets his family ahead.

The member is requesting the loan to buy supplies like cooking oil and rice, among others.  The member is grateful for the loan.  He pledges to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies like cooking oil and rice, among others.

loans.name: Evelyn Yanira

texts.es:
Evelyn de 38 años de edad,  estudio hasta  bachillerato técnico en la ciudad, actualmente esta soltera pero tiene una hija de 14 años que está estudiando básica en el centro escolar, es la única que depende de ella.

Evelyn trabaja como comerciante de ropa y calzado en la ciudad desde hace 3 años; fue iniciativa propia de ella de emprender esta actividad además tiene una pequeña tienda de útiles escolares, la cual le genera ingresos para salir adelante con su hija. El negocio está a 6 Km. de su vivienda y se transporta en bus  todos los días por la mañana, trabaja de 7:00- 4:00 de lunes a viernes y los sábados los 7:00-3:00 PM,

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar mas ropa y calzado para aumentar su negocio y obtener mayores ingresos, el préstamo le permitirá crecer su mercadería en el negocio y tener más productos para sus clientes.

Su meta es aumentar su negocio para obtener, mejores ganancias la cual le permitirá solventar la cuotas del crédito y las ganancias poderlas invertir en compras de mercadería para seguir creciendo y además seguirle dando el estudio a su hija para que pueda superarse.
texts.en:
Evelyn is 38 years old, and graduated from a technical high school in the city.  She is currently single, and has a 14 year old daughter who studies at the educational center.  Her daughter is her only dependent.  Evelyn has worked for the past three years selling clothing and shoes in the city.  She took up this business by her own initiative.  She also has a small school supplies store, that generates an income for her to get ahead with her daughter.  The business is 6km from her home, and she travels there by bus everyday in the mornings.  She works from 7am to 4pm Monday to Friday, and from 7am to 3pm on Saturdays.

The loan that she is seeking from CREDICAMPO will be used to purchase more clothing and shoes to expand her business and increase her earnings.  The loan will allow her to increase the merchandise in her store, and to have more products for her clients.  Her goal is to expand her business in order to generate more earnings, which will allow her to pay back the loan and invest her earnings in purchasing merchandise to continuing growing and continue providing her daughter with an education so that she can succeed.

loans.use: purchase more clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de Jesús mayor de edad, casada, con dos hijos aún bajo su responsabilidad, originaria de unos de los municipios Chinandega, ubicado en el occidente del país, donde predomina el turismo y el comercio. se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora, responsable, es propietaria de una pequeña pulpería ubicada en unos de los repartos de este municipio, en el cual ofrece productos de consumo diario como: granos básicos, papel higiénico, detergentes, productos congelados, entre otros, también ofrece productos de cosméticos como: shampoo, acondicionador, maquillajes, cremas, también mercadería en general como: ropa de interior de niños y adultos, ella realiza sus compras en el mercado y distribuidoras. Sus ventas las realizan al contado y al crédito recuperando semanal y quincenal, cuenta con clientes fijos y eventuales; desde muy temprano Teresa de Jesús abre las puertas de su negocio para ofrecer sus productos. inicia este negocio con fondos propios buscando una forma de apoyar en los gastos familiares y obtener mejores ingresos. El objetivo de este crédito es para invertirlo en capital de trabajo en la compra de: arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles, pan, jabones, entre otros productos de consumo.
texts.en:
Teresa de Jesús, an adult, is married and has two children for whom she is still responsible.  She is from the Chinandega municipality in the western part of the country.  Tourism and commerce predominate in this area.  She is known for being a hard-working, enterprising, and responsible woman.  She has a small grocery store in one of the neighborhoods in this municipality.  She offers daily consumption products like basic grains, toilet paper, detergent, and frozen products, among others.  She also sells cosmetic products like shampoo, conditioner, make-up, and creams.  She also sells general merchandise like underwear for children and adults.  

She makes her purchases at the market and at distributorships.  She makes her sales for cash and credit.  She collects weekly and biweekly.  She has fixed and occasional customers.  Teresa de Jesús opens the doors to her business very early in order to offer her products.

She started this business with her own funds as she was looking for a way to help with the family expenses and to get better income.

The purpose of this loan is to invest in working capital in order to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, beans, bread, soap, and other consumable products.

loans.use: to buy basic grains and general merchandise.

loans.name: Sanchita

texts.en:
Sanchita is from the small village of Baroghoria in the district of Jalpaiguri. She is married with three daughters who are students.  She is 43 and a housewife.  Her husband Sudhir, aged 49 years, is a cultivator.  Sanchita had secondary education but her husband completed higher secondary education.  One of their daughters goes to college and the other two are in grade 10 and grade 5. The family live in their own house.

Sanchita's husband is very hardworking and dedicated.  He invests his full time in his agricultural business and grows different vegetables.  Sanchita also helps him in his work, after managing her household jobs.  They sell their produces in the local market. But their income from this business is hardly enough to cover the family's basic needs.  So in order to improve their business and earn more income, she would like to expand their business. They have decided to cultivate potatoes in their farmland. Potatoes are a vegetable in much demand in their area, as they are used in most dishes.

Therefore, Sanchita has taken a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS, to purchase potato seeds and fertilizers to start cultivation of potatoes.  The loan is important for Sanchita to bring in a high enough income to sustain her family and improve their living conditions.

Sanchita hopes to give higher education to her daughters and purchase a plot of land in future with the profit generated from this business.

Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase potato seeds and fertilizers for cultivating potatoes.

loans.name: Leutuva

texts.en:
Leutuva is a 20-year-old, single woman, with one child. She has a small plantation and she grows taro, taamu, bananas, yams, breadfruit, etc. to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than two years.

Leutuva has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives, an axe, etc. for her business. She has been a member of South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) since 2012. 

With her profits, Leutuva hopes to develop her business to support her family and her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives, an axe, etc. for her plantation.

loans.name: Alofaatu

texts.en: Alofaatu is a 20 years old and single. She has a small farm where she grows taro, bananas, yams and other items to earn a living. She has been doing this for seven years and is requesting this loan to buy various items, including a weed sprayer, pesticides and knives for her business. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With the profits she expects to earn, Alofaatu hopes to expand her business and support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, pesticides, an axe and other items.

loans.name: Fualaau

texts.en:
Fualaau is 32 years old and a single woman with two children. She has a small garden where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for more than five years. 

Fualaau needs a loan to buy a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow, bush knives, spades, and chemicals. She has been a member of South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) since 2011. 

Fualaau will use the profits from her sales to improve her business and to financially support her family.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow, bush knives, spades, and chemicals.

loans.name: Malia

texts.en:
Malia is a 36-year-old married woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, bananas, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than five years.

Malia has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, etc for her business. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Malia hopes to extend her business and save for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, a file, and an ax.

loans.name: Nofo

texts.en:
Nofo is a 40-year-old married woman with seven children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, bananas, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than six years.

Nofo has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, bush knives, chemicals, an ax, a wheelbarrow, etc. She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. With her profits, Nofo hopes to develop her business for her family's living and her children's education.

loans.use: to buy bush knives, a file and an axe, chemicals, etc

loans.name: Aiganapule

texts.en:
Aiganapule is a 42-year-old woman who is married with 2 children. She runs a taxi in her community for a living, and she has 5 years with this business. 

Aiganapule needs a loan to buy tires, a car seat, mats, etc. She will use her profits to support her family and to pay for her children's education. Aiganapule joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy tires, paint, a car seat, mats, etc.

loans.name: Akata

texts.en: Akata is 37 years old and married with six children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for the last four years. She has requested a loan to buy supplies, including flour, sugar, a frying pan and shopping bags. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Akata will save for emergencies and for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, a frying pan, shopping bags and other items.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda manages a farm planted with citrus trees. She carefully manages this business since it is her family's primary source of income. She uses most of the money she earns to help her two children pursue their college education. She explains that she is always prepared to face the hardships of life to give a better future to her children. Erlinda’s goal is to fully support the needs of her children so they can finish their studies. She believes that by borrowing a loan of PHP 22,000 her citrus fruits will become productive because she will use it to buy fertilizers and herbicides. She hopes to harvest more, earn more and fully support her children's studies.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and herbicides for her citrus grove.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 27 years old and married with 3 children. She paints and sells clothes in her community to earn a living and has been doing this for 4 years.

Maria has requested a loan to buy paint, elei board (the printed fabric is called elei), fabrics, and materials. She plans to use her profits for her children's education and to support her family financially. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy paint, elei board, fabrics, materials, etc.

loans.name: Lauulu

texts.en:
Lauulu is a 41-year-old married woman with 4 children. She has a small plantation and grows bananas, yams and taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 5 years.

Lauulu has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, bush-knives, chemicals and a spade. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Lauulu hopes to pay for her children's school fees and to save more for unexpected emergencies.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, bush-knives, chemicals and a spade

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
Mãe solteira de 50 anos de idade, abandonada pelo marido a mais de 20 anos, tem 2 filhos maiores de idade, 1 a estudar no nível superior e outro a trabalhar e ajudar a mãe nas despesas. Cuida de 2 netos menores, estudou ate 4ª classe e vive à base de negocio a mais de 20 anos e esta a repetir o credito pela 4ª vez.
Com o empréstimo pretende comprar: refrescos, cerveja, vinhos e diversos produtos alimentares para ampliar o seu negocio que faz todos dias numa das barracas dentro do mercado central da vila.
Sua maior esperança é concluir a construção de sua casa que esta ainda numa fase inicial, ampliar o seu negocio  e sustentar os estudos de sua filha que esta no nível superior. 
O seu maior desafio, é a falta de fundos e tendo todas despesas na sua responsabilidade.
texts.en:
Amelia is a 50-year-old single mother. Her husband left her over 20 years ago. She has two adult children, one who's in college and one who's in the workforce and helps his mother with her expenses. She takes care of two underage grandchildren. Amelia completed 4th grade and has been earning a living through her business for over 20 years. This is her 4th loan.
With the loan she intends to purchase refreshments, beer, wine and various foodstuffs. That way she'll expand her business, which she runs everyday in one of the booths inside the village's central market.
Her biggest hope is to finish building her house which is still in its early stages, expand her business and pay for her daughter's college education.
Her biggest challenge is the lack of funds and being responsible for all the expenses.

loans.use: to purchase refreshments, beer, wine and various foodstuffs so she can expand her business.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 54 years old, married and had four children. She operates a store selling grocery items for income. She earns 5,000 PHP monthly and used it for her family's daily expenses.

Though her sales are good, she still wanted to improve her sales capacity but had insufficient funds. Because of that, she is now asking for additional capital of 20,000 PHP to buy canned goods, eggs, breads and soft drinks to sell. She will use her loan properly so she will attain her goal of business development. She hopes to keep extending good products and services to all her customers.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, eggs, breads and soft drinks to sell

loans.name: José Danoy

texts.es:
José de 38 años de edad, no tuvo ningún grado de educación, por la mentalidad de sus padres nunca lo enviaron a la escuela, ya que le decían que era mejor trabajar que la escuela, está soltero, actualmente se desempeña como agricultor en pequeño, vive con su madre.
  

Él es agricultor, su padre lo indujo al buen camino, de ser una persona de bien y productiva. En la zona que vive es totalmente agrícola, se dedica a la siembra de maíz, arroz y maicillo, también tiene ganado los cuales cuida, el trabajo lo tiene cerca de la casa por lo que no necesita un medio de transporte para ir a su trabajo, la actividad la realiza en compañía de sus hermanos, el horario de trabajo lo realiza de 5 am a 12 md.


José quiere comprar una yunta de novillos para amansarlos y poder trabajar con ellos en la agricultura, el préstamo le servirá para realizar la actividad productiva que desea hacer. La necesidad satisfecha será el poder realizar el negocio, ya que después de amansarlo los venderá teniendo un ingreso más en su hogar.

El poder tener primero lo más necesario  y luego formar su familia, por lo que espera trabajar duro para cuando vengan los hijos, el préstamo le ayudara en poder realizar una actividad productiva.
texts.en:
José, age 38, did not receive an education. Because of their mindset, his parents did not send him to school, telling him that it was better to work. He is single, and he lives with his mother. 

He works as a small-scale farmer; his father encouraged him to take this good path, and to be a good and productive person.   He lives in an area that is completely agricultural; he grows corn, rice, and sorghum, and he also has livestock that he cares for.  His work is near his home so he does not need  transportation.  He works with his brothers, and his schedule is from 5 a.m. until 12 noon.

José would like to purchase a pair of young steers, in order to break them in and be able to work with them in farming.  The loan will assist him in carrying out the productive work that he wants to do, and meet his needs for carrying out his business, as he will sell the steers once he has broken them in, and have an additional income for his home.  

The loan will help him to be able to carry out a productive occupation and to have what is most needed first; then he will be able to start a family for whom he hopes to work hard; and for his children when they are born.

loans.use: to purchase a pair of young steers in order to break them in.

loans.name: Galoiola

texts.en: Galoiola is 35 years old and married with 4 children. She runs a small business of raising and selling pigs in her community and has been doing this for 5 years. Galoiola has requested a loan to buy wire, a freezer and bush knives. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Galoiola will use it to support her family financially and to pay her children's school fees."

loans.use: to buy wire, freezer and bush knives etc

loans.name: Fetu

texts.en: "Fetu is 50 years old and married with 5 children. She has a huge plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for more than 10 years. Fetu needs a loan to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, wheelbarrow, spades, etc. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. Fetu will use the profits from her sales to pay for her children's education and to support her family financially."

loans.use: to  buy chemicals, weed sprayer, wheelbarrow, spades,etc.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.pt:
É  viúva de 42 anos de idade, mãe de 6 filhos dos quais 4 ainda a estudarem e 2 já a trabalharem, vive na casa própria, esta a repetir o crédito e sua base de sustento é a criação de frangos, tem capoeiras dentro do seu quintal. 
Com o crédito pretende comprar pintos, ração, vacinas e vitaminas para ampliar a sua criação de frangos.
O seu maior sonho é terminar a construção de sua casa para melhor conforto de seus filhos.
Seu maior desafio é o tipo de negócio que faz, uma vez é uma batalha muito grande face à concorrência e também os riscos que corre na criação.
texts.en:
Carolina is a 42-year-old widow. She has six children, four of whom still study and two are already in the workforce. She lives in a house that she owns. Carolina made loans before and her means of livelihood is her chicken farm. She has coops in her yard.
With the loan she intends to purchase chicks, feed, vaccines and vitamins so that she can enlarge her chicken farm.
Her biggest dream is to finish building her house in order to provide more comfort for her children.
Her biggest challenge is the kind of business she does, since it's an uphill battle due to the competition and also the risks involved in raising animals.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, feed, vaccines and vitamins so she can enlarge her chicken farm.

loans.name: Salome

texts.en:
Salome, a 59-year-old married mother of three, is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For 35 years now, she has operated a candy-making business in the Philippines. 

Salome is now requesting a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her enterprise. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her candy-making business.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is 55 years old and married with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Sonia has a selling dried fish business in the Philippines. Sonia requested a PHP 30000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more dried fish to sell.

Sonia has been in this business for twenty-five years. In the future Sonia would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Eleonor

texts.en:
Eleonor is 52 years old and married with eight children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Eleonor has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 6,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

Eleonor has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is 34 years old, married and has two children, one of whom is in school.  She has been raising pigs in the Philippines for three years now and is requesting a PHP 7000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

In the future, Vivian would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: "Malia is a single 25 years old lady. She has a small plantation and grows bananas and taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years. Malia has requested a loan to buy a weed-sprayer, a wheelbarrow and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. With her profits, Malia hopes to improve her business and to support her family financially."

loans.use: to buy a weedsprayer, a wheelbarrow and chemicals etc

loans.name: Sandra

texts.pt:
Tem 36 anos de idade, vive maritalmente mas com marido que trabalha na vizinha Africa do Sul, mãe de 4 filhos menores e os que tem idade escolar tem acesso à escola. Ela cuida apenas de seus filhos, vive à base de negocio de venda de cobertores e produtos alimentares em sua casa e para reforçar as despesas da família. 
Esta a repetir o credito pela 3ª vez na Hluvuku.Com o empréstimo pretende comprar: mantas djuvetes, açúcar, amendoim, rebuçados, bebidas, para ampliar o seu negocio que faz numa pequena banca em sua casa.
Seu maior sonho é poder concluir sua casa que acabou de iniciar a construção e actualmente vive numa casa de material local e tornar seu negocio mais sustentável.
Aponta como seu maior desafio, as limitações financeiras que tem para por em pratica os seus planos.
texts.en:
Sandra is 36 years old. She's in a common law marriage but her husband works in neighboring South Africa. She has four underage children and the ones who are school-aged attend school. Sandra only has her own children to take care of. She earns a living through her business selling blankets and foodstuffs from her home in order to afford her family's expenses.
This is her third loan with Hluvuku. With the loan she intends to purchase duvet covers, sugar, peanuts, candy and beverages so she can expand her business which she runs from a small stand in her house.
Her biggest dream is to be able to finish her house, which she just started building. She currently lives in a house built with local materials. She also dreams of turning hers into a more sustainable business.
She considers her biggest challenge to be the financial limitations she faces in terms of putting her plans into practice.

loans.use: to purchase duvet covers, sugar, peanuts, candy and beverages so she can expand her business.

loans.name: Masae

texts.en: "Masae is a 50 year-old widow woman with 5 children. She makes and sells pan-cakes in her community to earn a living. She has 6 years of experience with this business. Masae needs a loan to buy flour, sugar , yeast, baking powder, cooking oil, tongs etc. She plans to use her profits to help her family. Masae has been a member of SPBD from 2011 to 2014."

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar , yeast, baking powder, cooking oil,tongs etc

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en:
Melinda is a 45-year-old widowed mother of six children, three of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them. 

For two years now, Melinda has been running a general store in the Philippines that sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap and other groceries. She has requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell. 

In the future, Melinda would like to save money to expand her enterprise and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell.

loans.name: Herlyn

texts.en:
Herlyn is 24 years old, married with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Herlyn has a fishing business in the Philippines. Herlyn requested a PHP 18000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing net and other equipment.

Herlyn has been in this business for two years. In the future Herlyn would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and other equipment.

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is 32 years old and is married with two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Michelle is borrowing PHP 7000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Michelle has been raising pigs for five years and also earns additional income from selling fruits and vegetables.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Menchie

texts.en:
Menchie is 46 years old and is married with four children, who are all in school. Menchie works very hard to provide for them.

Menchie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Menchie has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future Menchie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn is 34 years old and married.

Jonalyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more goods to sell.

Jonalyn has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and also earns an income from E-Loading (mobile prepaid load).

Jonalyn aspires to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell.

loans.name: Jinky

texts.en:
Jinky is 36 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Jinky has a restaurant business in the Philippines. Jinky requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her restaurant.

Jinky has been in this business for ten years. In the future Jinky would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her restaurant.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 54 years old,  is married and has twelve children.  Four of her children are in school

Evelyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Evelyn requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She has been raising pigs for four years.

In the future Evelyn would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Annabelle works hard to support her family.

She has a candy-making business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a general store.  Annabelle is borrowing PHP 30000 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her candy-making business.

Annabelle has sustained her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her candy-making.

loans.name: Ma. Erna

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Ma. Erna works hard to support her family.

She has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Ma. Erna is borrowing PHP 30000 through NWTF to  buy spare parts for her tricycle for her tricycle transportation business.

Ma. Erna has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Andrieta

texts.pt:
Mãe viúva de 49 anos de idade, tem dois filhos maiores, os dois estudam e 1 dos quais no ensino superior, cuida de sua mãe que vive junto com ela, está a estudar no nível superior numa das universidades de Maputo . este é o segundo credito com a Hluvuku, para a criação de frangos e venda de produtos alimentares diversos, razão pela qual o crédito esta registado com juro ponderado, de bens de consumo.
Ela pretende comprar pintos, rações e vacinas para criar em sua casa e na compra e venda de produtos alimentares numa barraca na cidade de Maputo.
Sua maior esperança é progredir e transformar se numa grande empresária e ter vários pontos para abastecer o seu frango.
Seu desafio é ganhar o mercado e ter bons lucros.
texts.en:
Andrieta is a 49-year-old widow and a mother. She has two adult children, both of whom study and one of them is in college. She takes care of her mother who lives with her. Andrieta is a college student in one of the universities of Maputo. This is her second loan with Hluvuku for her business raising chickens and selling various foodstuffs. That's why the loan has a compound interest rate applicable to consumer goods.
She intends to purchase feed, vaccines and chicks which she'll raise in her house. She also intends to buy and sell foodstuffs in a booth located in the town of Maputo.
Her biggest hope is to get ahead, become a great entrepreneur and have several outlets to supply her chickens to.
Her biggest challenge is to winning over the market and making good profits.

loans.use: to raise chickens and sell foodstuffs.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es:
Jesus vive en compañia de su esposa y sus hijos en La Paz. Es asalariado dependiente de una heladeria, necesita el credito para terminar de hacer reparaciones en su domicilio.

El sueño de Jesus es de tener su propio negocio y que sean profesionales sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jesus lives with his wife and children in La Paz.  He works for an ice creamery and needs a loan to make home repairs.

His dream is to have his own business and for his children to become professionals.

loans.use: to make home repairs.

loans.name: Sokleap

texts.en:
Sokleap is 29 years old, married, and a young mother of two children. She is hardworking and active. 

Sokleap started a business as a seamstress and has been sewing and restoring clothes. She learned everything about running her business from her previous job as a garment worker and from attending a private vocational training center to learn core skills. In addition to running her shop, Sokleap also helps her husband till their farm and operate a fish farm. These business activities increase their household income.

Sokeap is asking for a loan to help her further develop her agribusinesses. The loan will be used to buy more fish to raise and fertilizer for her rice paddy. Sokleap says that her greatest wish is to expand her business and make it more profitable. Her goal is to provide her children with the opportunity to study at a university so that they can become honest and successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy fish for her fish farm and fertilizer for her rice paddy

loans.name: Esther

texts.es: Esther vive en la ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y su actividad es la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños como por ejemplo polos, chompas, pantalones,camisas entre otros más. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercaderia como por ejemplo chompas y pantalones.
texts.en: Esther lives in the city of Cusco, in southern Peru.  She sells men’s ladies’ and children’s clothing, such as polo shirts, sweaters, pants, shirts, and other things.  She has been doing this for several years and things are going well for her.  She is asking for this loan to buy merchandise like sweaters and pants.

loans.use: to buy sweaters and pants.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio's business is hog-raising. He has been in this business for almost three years. Antonio usually earns a net income of 2,500 PHP per piglet. Antonio and his family live in the village of Consular. He wants to uplift his four children out of poverty, that's why he works hard with his wife. 

At this moment, Antonio is asking for a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP to buy feed and vaccine for the proper growth of his hogs. Antonio hopes that he can obtain his desired loan to further improve his hog-raising business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccine for the proper growth of his hogs

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en: Jonalyn is from the village of Guam in the town of San Guillermo. She is 21 years of age. She has two children. To raise them she is engaged in selling vegetables. She has been in this business for two years and usually earns about PHP 250 a day. To this end she is asking a loan in the amount of PHP 5,000 to buy tomatoes, potatos, squash and string beans to sell. She hopes to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, potatos, squash and string beans to sell

loans.name: Rose Ann

texts.en: Rose Ann is proud to share that she is a hog-raiser. She is 26 years of age and still single. Rose Ann has been in this business for almost one year. At this time, Rose Ann is asking for a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP to buy feed and vaccine for the maintenance of her hogs. She hopes to grow her business, so that she will be able to help her parents improve their family standard of living.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccine for the maintenance of her hogs

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 45 years old and married with five children. None of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Susan has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Susan requested a PHP 14000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

Susan has been in this business for 15 years. In the future Susan would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Gertrudis

texts.es:
Gertrudis es una campesina humilde y trabajadora de 56 años de edad, desde pequeña sus padres le enseñaron todas las labores del campo, gracias a esto presta el servicio como agricultora al jornal y en algunas ocasiones trabaja como empleada doméstica en casas de la región, para complementar los ingresos, de manera alterna, cría y engorda pollos para la venta, los galpones están ubicados en su casa y con el dinero que esta actividad le genera, logra sostener a sus padres con quienes vive.
Con el dinero del crédito que solicita comprará más pollos para engorde, concentrado al por mayor y realizará adecuaciones en los galpones, esto le permitirá aumentar la producción, generando así mayores ingresos por ventas, pues podrá satisfacer la demanda actual del producto, entre sus principales clientes que son familiares, amigos, vecinos y algunas tiendas del sector.
Gertrudis manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder dar una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar a sus padres, para pasar muchos más años con ellos.
texts.en:
Gertrudisis is a humble and hardworking country lady.  She is 56 years old and has been working the fields since her parents showed her everything when she was young.  Thanks to this, she is a farmer and at times also works as a domestic employee at local homes in order to earn an extra income.  She also raises chickens for sale.  The coups are at her home and she uses the money from this to support her parents.  She lives with them.

She will use the money from this loan to buy more chickens to raise, feed in quantity, and make improvements to her chicken coups.  This will allow her to increase production, generate more income through sales, and be able to satisfy her product demands among her main customers who include her family, friends, neighbors and others in the area.

Gertrudes says that her main desire is to be able to improve her life and wellbeing for her parents so she can spend more years with them.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana vive en casa propia con su hijo en la ciudad de La Paz, se dedica a la venta de chompas y chamarras las cuales las compra en Desaguadero y las vende en los pueblos

Necesita credito para comprar más chompas para incrementar sus ventas de ropa y seguir vendiendo sin perder clientela ya que es su unca fuente de ingresos con la cual se mantiene.
 
El sueño de Juana es poder tener una tienda y ya no viajar ya que los viajes son muy peligrosos
texts.en: Juana lives in a home of her own in the city of La Paz.  She sells sweaters and jackets, which she buys in Desaguadero and sells in the towns.  She needs a loan to buy sweaters to increase her sales without losing any customers.  This is her only source of income.  Juana’s dream is to have a store and not have to travel because the trips are dangerous.

loans.use: to buy sweaters.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.pt:
Mãe viúva de 36 anos de idade, tem 3 filhos menores, mas com acesso à educação, estudou ate 5ª classe, vive na casa própria e à base de agricultura a muitos anos, tem trabalhado sozinha, mas em caso de necessidade emprega 3 pessoas de apoio e esta a repetir o credito pela 4ªvez.
Com o credito pretende comprar sementes de feijão verde e pesticidas para a produção da respectiva cultura, na sua machamba localizada na associação de camponeses Bloco 2.
Seu maior sonho é construir uma barraca de venda de produtos alimentares e construir casas para aluguer, de maneiras a descansar a pratica de agricultura que, segundo ela, não é tarefa fácil.
Seu maior desafio, é o risco que corre na sua actividade agrícola, tanto na produção bem como no mercado, mas que mesmo assim nunca desistiu.
texts.en:
Matilde is a 36-year-old widow and a mother. She has three underage children who have access to education. She completed 5th grade. Matilde lives in a house that she owns and has earned a living through agriculture for several years. She works alone, but if she needs to, she employs three people for help. This is her 4th loan.
With the loan she intends to purchase green bean seeds and pesticide in order to grow a green bean crop in her farm. Her farm is located in the "Bloco 2" farmers' association.
Her biggest dream is to build a booth for selling foodstuffs and houses for renting out. That way she'll get a rest from farming, which according to her is not an easy chore.
Her biggest challenge is the risk involved in her farming business both in terms of production and market, and even so, she never gave up on it.

loans.use: to purchase green bean seeds and pesticide in order to grow a green bean crop.

loans.name: Jaime Agustín

texts.es:
Jaime Agustín es un joven de 24 años, Sauceño, casado, padre de familia de un niño, que se dedica a laborar como obrero para una Institución del estado.
A pesar de ser muy joven es bien responsable y trabajador que lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar y está al pendiente de su familia y su mamá.
Todos los días se levanta muy temprano para iniciar sus labores como dando mantenimiento a las principales calles del municipio, trabajo que lo realiza con dedicación y eficiencia aguantando sol y lluvias.
Jaime se preocupa por la salud de su madre pero no cuenta con los recursos económicos para mejorar su salud, es por esto que se presentó por primera vez a la oficina de Ceprodel en busca de un financiamiento para la compra de medicina porque se dio cuenta que hay unos inversionistas llamado kiva que apoyan a las personas de escasos recursos y tal es su caso que gana muy poco por lo que no puede cubrir estos gastos, esperando y confiando en Dios que apoyen su solicitud.
texts.en:
Jaime Agustin is a 24 year old young man.  He is married and the father of a son.  He also works as a laborer for a government institution.

Despite being very young, he is very responsible and hardworking and brings home the bacon while he cares for his mother and family.

Every day he rises very early in the morning to begin his work, such as maintaining the main streets in town, work that he does with dedication and efficiency, rain or shine.

Jaime is worried about his mother’s health but doesn’t have the financial resources to improve it, so he approached CEPRODEL in search of a loan to buy medicine because he found out that there were some lenders called “Kiva” who help people of scarce resources and since he doesn’t earn much he is not able to cover the costs.  He is hoping and trusting in God that you will support his request.

loans.use: to buy medicine.

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en: Jimmy has been raising hogs for more than five years. He is married and blessed with three children. Jimmy would like to have a better way of life and a stable source of income. To make it possible, he spends his time raising his hogs well and cultivating his rice fields so that his ventures are more productive. At this time, he is requesting additional working capital of 20,000 PHP, which will allow him to buy hog feed, vitamins and vaccines in order to ensure that his hogs are healthy and have optimum growth. This loan will really help his business grow, which will enable him to gain more income and an improved lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy hog feed, vitamins and vaccines

loans.name: Theng

texts.en:
Theng is a 65-year-old farmer from a remote area of Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. She is married to Reourn who is 74 years old and they have only one child. Theng’s husband also works in the same business as her, growing rice and selling it in the local markets. They have been working in this field for more than 35 years. Farming is the sole source of their income.

Recently, Theng is asking for a loan which will be used to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank for the sake of her family members and so as to improve her household sanitation practices. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Theng is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family, and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank for the sake of her family members.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a cooking gas package in order to feed his child enough warm food

loans.name: Monalisa
