His sons and wife help him greatly in farming, since Borik is also the main shepherd of his village, which takes much time, and sometimes he gets very worried about his farm cattle and the care that it needs every day. 

The main product that he sells from his farm is the meat, which he already has loyal customers for.
Borik asks a loan of 500,000 Armenian Drams (AMD) since he wants to buy a truck that he needs to bring fodder for his cattle and sometimes drive to the local wholesale market where he sells the meat.

loans.use: to buy a truck he needs to bring fodder for his cattle and drive to local wholesale market.

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Judy lives in the Siongiroi area of South Rift, Kenya with her only child. She has been doing farming for four years, producing and selling milk, eggs, vegetables and fruit. She enjoys feeding her cows, while her biggest challenge is lack of transport.

Judy chose Juhudi Kilimo because they offer low interest rates on their loans. During the training, she learnt that microfinance institutions  assist small-holder farmers in growing economically. 

Judy's highest monthly expense is school fees and this expense will be reduced by the eggs and poultry that she buys which will produce more income. That will also improve her family's living standard.

loans.use: to purchase poultry

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a jolly farmer living in the Siongiroi area of South Rift Kenya. She is married with one child.

She has been farming for 6 years, and her primary income comes from producing and selling milk, eggs, vegetable and horticulture crops. She really enjoys feeding her livestock.
 
Beatrice chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because they offer their loans at a low interest rate and they give a grace period. During the training, she got to know that MFIs normally assist smallholder farmers by financing their small projects. The chaff cutter will be used to cut nappier grass for her animals, and also to sell. This will make her dairy cows more productive which will lead to more income. She will thus be able to provide a better education for her child.

loans.use: to purchase a chaff cutter

loans.name: Kasi-Mpya  Group Musoma

texts.en:
Asia, who is in her mid 20s, is married with three children who are still in school. She has been running a business of selling small dry fish for two years.  She works from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily, and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Asia's 8th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to keep increasing the small dry fish stock, and has paid back all her loans successfully. She used the profit to buy and sell the local chicken and pay for school fees and household expenses. She is doing fine with the loan.  She will use this loan to buy more small dry fish to resell. She dreams of opening a retail shop.

Asia will share this loan with her loan group "Kasi-Mpya Group Musoma," which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more small dry fish to resell.

loans.name: Claudia Maria

texts.es: Claudia Maria, mayor de edad madre soltera de un hijo aun bajo su responsabilidad originaria del municipio de Chinandega, ubicado en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora con muchos deseos de superación personal, Claudia es propietaria de un pequeño salón de belleza ubicado en su casa de habitación donde ofrece  el servicio de: planchado y secado de cabello, corte de pelo, tintes, mechas, maniqure y pedicure, al igual que ofrece a sus clientes productos de cosméticos como maquillajes, cremas perfumenes entre otros, también ofrece variedades estilos de ropa, para damas ,caballeros y niños, en la actualidad ha logrado mantener el negocio gracias al buen servicio que ella ofrece a sus clientes, inicia sus negocio con fondos propios, al ver la necesidad que tenia para salir adelante y junto con su hijo, Claudia Maria con la experiencia que ha logrado adquirir durante todo este tiempo le ha ayudado a mejorar mas en su negocio y a captar mas cliente, sus  compras las realiza al contado, en distribuidoras de otro departamento, el financiamiento que esta solicitado es para la compra de una activo fijo(Vitrina) para colocar sus productos de bellezas como:tintes, brochas, alisadores, planchas, maquillajes, crema para pedicure, tratamiento para el cabello entre otros.  y para capital de trabajo, debido a que en este negocio tiene que tener bien surtido para así ofrecerles servicios de calidad a sus clientes.-
texts.en:
Claudia Maria is a mature woman and single mother of one son who is still in her care. She is a native of the municipality of Chinandega, located in the western part of the country. She is known for being a hardworking woman with a strong desire for self-improvement.

Claudia is the owner of a small beauty salon located in her residence where she offers the following services: blow-outs, haircuts, hair color, highlights, manicures, and pedicures. She also offers her customers cosmetic products like make-up, creams, perfumes, and more. She also sells various styles of clothing for ladies, gentlemen, and children. 

She has managed to keep her business going thanks to her good customer service. She started her business with her own funds when she saw that she needed to provide for herself and her son. The experience that she has managed to acquire over all this time has helped her to improve her business and win more customers. She makes her purchases in cash from distributors in another department of Nicaragua. 

The financing Claudia is requesting is for the purchase of a fixed asset (a display case) for beauty products like dyes, brushes, relaxers, straightening irons, make-up, pedicure creams, hair treatments, and more. The loan will also be used for working capital, because her business has to be well-stocked so that she can offer quality services to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase fixed assets (a display case) and to invest in working capital for dyes, brushes, hair relaxers, creams, treatments, and more.

loans.name: Rosa Eveling

texts.es: Rosa Eveling es mayor de edad, con unión libre, con un hijo menor aún bajo su responsabilidad, originaria de unos de los municipios del norte de Chinandega, ubicado en el occidente del país, ella es propietaria de una pulpería en el cual vende productos de consumo para el hogar como: granos básicos, detergentes, productos congelados, golosinas, cosméticos,  entre otros, ella realiza sus compras en camiones distribuidores y en mercado de este municipio, también sus ventas son  al contado y al crédito. inicia su jornada diaria desde muy temprano abre las puertas de su negocio Rosa Eveling solicita el préstamo para invertir en su pulpería en la compra de granos básicos, productos congelados, entre otros. Ella está muy agradecida con los inversionistas kiva por la ayuda que les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y a países pobres como Nicaragua, para poder superarse y tener fuentes de trabajo.
texts.en:
Rosa Eveling is an adult who is in a common-law relationship and has one child who she is responsible for. She is a native of a municipality north of Chinandega in the West of the country. She is the owner of a small store where she sells household products like basic grains, detergents, frozen products, sweets, cosmetics, etc. She makes her purchases from distribution trucks and the local market in the municipality. Her sales are for cash and on credit. She starts her day early opening the doors of her business. 

Rosa Eveling is requesting a loan to invest in her store buying basic grains, frozen products, etc. She is very grateful to the lenders at Kiva for the support they offer to people of low resources and poor countries like Nicaragua so that they can get ahead and have employment.

loans.use: to buy daily use items for her store like rice, sugar, beans, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is thirty-five years old and lives in Hoima, Uganda. He started business in 2000 and works six days a week. He has five children to look after and educate as a caring parent. He is in the motorcycle transport business and earns additional income from rentals. He desires to expand his rental business, but is limited by capital because of delayed rental payments and the bad roads that affect his transport business.
 
Patrick is acquiring a loan to expand his rentals.

loans.use: to expand his rental property.

loans.name: Bilha

texts.en:
Bilha is a 32-year-old woman, married with two children aged 12 and 8 years old whom she supports. This is her fourth loan of Ksh.90,000. She was introduced to Visionfund Kenya  by a Visionfund officer. She sells cloth, and her business is located at Watamu. She has been in this business for ten years and she earns a monthly income of Ksh.18,000.

Bilha is planning to use the loan to purchase more khangas (lengths of cloth used as clothing) and African bags to sell to her customers. She will use the profit to expand the business. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to open a boutique and educate her child.

loans.use: To purchase more khangas (lengths of African print cloth) and African bags to sell to her customers

loans.name: Florentin

texts.es:
Florentín, se decidió por otro crédito para invertirlo en la compra de insecticida, herbicida, abono y pago del arrendamiento del terreno en el que cultivara maíz, le servirá para continuar mejorando sus ganancias.
Para el Sr. Florentín el capital anterior le ayudo a aumentar su ganado, tener producción de lácteos tanto para consumo familiar como para comercializar con sus vecinos y tener una cosecha abundante y libre de plagas, los nuevos ingresos le ayudan a cubrir los compromisos económicos y mejorar día con día las circunstancias familiares.
texts.en:
Florentin has decided to take another loan to invest in insecticide, herbicide, and organic fertilizer, and also to pay to rent some land where he will cultivate corn.  This will enable him to continue to increase his earnings.

For Florentin, the previous loan helped him to increase his cattle holdings so that he has dairy production to use for his family's consumption as well as to sell to his neighbors, and it also enabled him to have an abundant harvest free of pests.  The additional income he earned helped to cover his financial obligations, and also gradually improved his family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy insecticide, herbicide, organic fertilizer, and to pay to rent some land

loans.name: Aïssata  Mamadou

texts.fr: Madame Aissata est une femme âgée de 56 ans qui vit dans la localité, elle est divorcée  et mère de 2 enfants dont le plus âgé  18ans et le plus petit 17ans. Elle évolue dans la commercialisation des tissus et glaces et  a une expérience de plus de 10 ans dans cette activité. Elle sollicite ce montant pour acheter des tissus et satisfaire ses clients. Aissata gère les charges quotidiennes de sa famille et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Elle commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 14h. A l’avenir, elle souhaite augmenter son stock de marchandises et diversifier ses activités. Elle a choisi ce métier par amour et voudrait avoir une autonomie financière.
texts.en:
Aissata is 56 years old, divorced, and a mother of two children, who are 17 and 18 years old. She works selling fabrics and ice, with which she has more than ten years experience. She is seeking this loan to buy fabric to satisfy her customers. 

Aissata manages her family's everyday expenses and her children's school fees. She starts her day at 9 a.m. and finishes at 2 p.m.

In the future, Aissata wishes to increase her stock and to diversify her business. She chose this work because she enjoys it, and she would like to have financial independence.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and ice to resell

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is a 37-year-old male and is married with five children (ages 3,5, 7, 9, and 12), whom he supports. This is his second loan of 40,000 KES. He was introduced to Visionfund Kenya  by the Visionfund officer. He is a fishmonger and his business is located at Muyeye. He has been in this business for 14 years and earns a monthly income of 11,000 KES. 

Alfred is planning to use the loan to purchase more fish to sell to his customers. He will use the profit to expand his business. His hopes and dreams for the future are to expand his business and educate his children.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to his customers

loans.name: San Lorenzo Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios emprendedores una de ellas es Anabell mujer de 22 años, acompañada, que desde hace cuatro años tiene una pulpería en su domicilio, ella misma atiende el negocio, y el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de productos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite en bidón, jabón de baño, jabón de lavar ropa, jabón de lavar trastos, carne de res, carne de pollo, embutidos, salsa de tomate naturas, medicamentos populares, caramelos, galletas, shampoo etc. Rolando tiene 36 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de escobas y Jose tiene 40 años y su negocio es la compra y venta de tamarindo por cosechas.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising members. One of them is a woman named Anabell. She is 22 years old, in a relationship, and has managed a grocery business from her home for the past four years. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of products such as rice, beans, sugar, drums of oil, bath soap, laundry soap, furniture cleaner, beef, chicken, sausages, natural tomato sauce, popular medicines, caramels, cookies, shampoo, and other items.

Rolando is 36 years old and has a business of selling brooms. Jose is 40 years old and is in the business of buying and selling harvested tamarind.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es:
Marta, es casada, tiene dos hijos de 8 y 9 años de edad, en su lucha constante por cubrir los gastos familiares y estar al pendiente de su familia, fundó una tienda en su residencia, en la que ofrece productos de primera necesidad, su horario es de 8:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m., hasta la fecha no ha tenido ningún problema en administrar su negocio.
El capital que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de sodas, jugos, granos básicos, galletas, pan, dulces, etc., así tendrá todo lo necesario para responder de inmediato a las demandas de sus clientes y con ello vender más y mejorar su economía.
Su sueño es fortalecer cada vez más su negocio para tener una mejor rentabilidad y así continuar cumpliendo con los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en: Marta is married and has two children aged 8 and 9 years old. In her constant struggle to cover the household expenses and take care of her family, she started a store in her home where she sells basic use items. She is open from 8 am until 4 pm and up to now she has had no problems running the business. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of soft drinks, juices, basic grains, biscuits, bread, sweets, etc. Then she will have everything she needs to meet the demands of her clients and sell more and improve her finances. Her dream is to constantly improve her business to generate higher profits and continue to pay the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, juices, basic grains, biscuits, bread, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Ashkhen

texts.en:
Ashkhen is 38 years old and she lives with her big family in the village of Aygehovit in Tavush region. She is a mother of four children, three daughters and a son. Her eldest daughter is already a student and her other children are still school-aged. This is a nice peasant family, all the members of which are engaged in farming, even Ashkhen’s six-year-old son, who has the duty of keeping their chickens always fed. They also have three cows and a large fruit and vegetable garden, where they raise apples, figs, persimmons, greens, carrots, beans, etc.  Half of their farm products (milk, cheese, eggs, fruits and vegetables) are used for their big family and a small part is sold to re-sellers. 

Ashken greatly wants to make her farm richer and also to make her small farm income bigger and that is why she is asking for a loan of 200,000 Armenian drams to buy several piglets and also some animal fodder.

loans.use: to buy several piglets and some animal fodder to make her small farm income bigger

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur is 49 years old and lives with his family in the village of Tshakaten in the Syunik region. Artur has a son and two daughters. His son works as a driver and his two daughters are still school-aged. Artur also used to work as a driver but now he only does cargo transfers in the Syunik region. At the same time, Artur runs a farm. On his farm, he has two cows, two calves. Artur’s wife sells milk and macun (a national dairy product) from their farm. It is clear that, like their small farm, their family income is also rather small. As a result, they have many unsolved financial problems in their family and on their farm. 

Now Artur is asking for a loan of 1,000,000 Armenian drams because he wants to buy a cow and car tires for his track. The loan will also assist Artur with his sowing activities

loans.use: to buy a cow, car tires for his track, and assist with his sowing activities

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks of spare parts and building materials.

loans.name: Kekeli Group

texts.fr:
Adjowa est une femme mariée âgée de 40 ans avec 3 enfants en charge. Elle habite Lomé, quartier Agoè où elle dirige le groupe KEKELI. Restauratrice de pâte de maïs entre 2008 et 2012, Adjowa est depuis 2013 commerçante de pagne de type BT et HITARGET qu’elle achète au grand marché de Lomé. 
Les autres membres du groupe  KEKELI sont revendeuses de céréales, chaussures, fruits, ustensiles de cuisines, légumes et s’approvisionnent; certains au marché d’Agoè et d’autres au grand marché de Lomé. 
Elles sollicitent chacune un crédit, pour  renforcer son activité afin de toucher un plus grand nombre de clients.
texts.en:
Adjowa is 40 years old, married, and has three children under her care. She lives in Lome, a neighborhood in Agoe, where she manages the Kekeli group. Between 2008 and 2012, she worked making cold porcelain, but since 2013, Adjowa has started selling BT and Hitarget pagnes [types of bright, colorful fabric] which she gets from the Lome Grand Market.

The other group members sell cereals, shoes, fruits, kitchen utensils, and vegetables, which they procure from certain markets in Agoe and at the Lome Grand Market. They are each seeking a loan to strengthen their businesses in order to reach more customers.

loans.use: to buy nine lengths of pagnes [bright colorful fabric]

loans.name: Muguta

texts.en:
Muguta, aged 40, lives in Hoima, Uganda. He has a produce business and gets extra income from a bar, retail shop and farming where he is assured of constant income throughout the year. Despite his progress, he is challenged by price fluctuations and the bad roads that make transportation of the produce to his customers difficult. However, his vision is to buy his personal vehicle to enable him to travel with ease to the villages to buy produce.

Mugura has asked for a loan to buy more beans, rice and groundnuts to sell.

loans.use: to buy more beans, rice and groundnuts to sell.

loans.name: Ana Zoila

texts.es: Ana tiene 37 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida dado que sus hijas ya son mayores de edad y son independientes. Ana ha trabajado muy duro toda su vida para lograr sacar a delante a su familia. Junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía de su hogar y tratan de mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Ana solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cerco perimetral de su terreno dado que se encuentra al aire libre y parte del terreno lo usa para cultivo y los animales se meten dañando los cultivos. Con el monto solicitado comprará alambre de púa, postes de cemento, clavos, etc.
texts.en:
Ana is 37 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her life companion. Their daughters are already adults and independent. Ana has worked very hard all her life to successfully get her family ahead. Together with her life companion, she maintains the household budget and tries to improve their living conditions.

Ana has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a fence around the perimeter of her land, which currently is an open outdoor area. She uses part of the land for cultivation and animals can get inside and damage her crops. With the requested amount she will buy barbed wire, cement posts, nails, etc.

loans.use: to buy barbed wire, cement posts and nails to construct perimeter fencing

loans.name: Sandra Jeaneth

texts.es: Sandra tiene 32 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo de 10 años de edad. Sandra se dedica a la venta de pescado ambulante desde hace más de 10 años. Sandra desea reparar el techo de la vivienda ya que esta deteriorado por causa del tiempo y las lluvias. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso pero si con la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Sandra is 32 years old and lives in her own home with her 10 year old son. Sandra has sold fish as a street vendor for over 10 years. Sandra wishes to repair the roof of her home as it is deteriorating from the weather and rain. With the loan she seeks she will buy galvanized sheeting and wood. She hopes to be able to count on this financing as she doesn't have the available capital to pay for this expense but she can make the loan payments.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa tiene 49 años de edad  y reside junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia. Teresa tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a la venta de pollos, plantas y recargas telefónicas lo cual le permite ganarse la vida de forma honrada y mantener la economía del hogar. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos por lo que desea mantenerlo activo con el fin de mantener sus clientes y llagar a cubrir una mayor cuota de mercado que le permita aumentar las ventas y sus ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de pollos, plantas y recargas telefónicas.
texts.en: Teresa is 49 years old and lives with her family in her own house. Teresa has a lot of time to dedicate herself to selling chicken, plants and phone credit which allows her to earn a living in an honorable way and support her family. This business is her main source of income so she wishes to keep it active with the goal of supporting her customers and manage to cover a greater market share which allows her to increase sales and her income. For the above, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in her business in the purchase of chicken, plants and phone credits.

loans.use: to buy chicken, plants and phone credit.

loans.name: Vilma Del Carmen

texts.es: Vilma tiene 54 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo quien es mayor de edad. Vilma se gana la vida por medio de la venta de cocos desde hace más de 10 años. Vilma desea reparar el techo del corredor de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para proceder lo antes posible a la mejora del techo y poder contar con mayor seguridad habitacional.
texts.en: Vilma is 54 years old and lives in her own house with her grown son.  She has worked selling coconuts for more than 10 years.  Vilma wants to fix the roof over her house's porch, which is why she is asking for this loan through FUSAI.  She will use it to buy sheet metal and wood so she can fix her roof as soon as possible and improve her home's safety.

loans.use: buy sheet metal and wood so she fix the roof of her house.

loans.name: Maria Teofila

texts.es: María tiene 41 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 20 años y 12 años de edad. María se dedica a la venta de plantas en un puesto que tiene en el mercado y además, también vende ricos almuerzos los cuales comercializa de lunes a viernes. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a sus hijos. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos por lo que desea invertir en el en la compra de variedad de plantas e insumos para el comedor(pollo, carnes, verduras, especies, etc.) y así mantener activo su negocio y poder llegar a un número mayor de clientes que le permitan mejorar sus ventas como sus ingresos.
texts.en:
María is 41 years old and lives in her own home along with her two children, 20 and 12 years old. María makes a living through the sale of plants in a stall that she has in the market. She also sells delicious lunches which she sells Monday through Friday. She has dedicated herself to the business for a long time, and this is how she makes a living and provides food to her children. 

This business is her main source of income which is why she wishes to invest in it by purchasing a variety of plants and kitchen supplies (chicken, meat, vegetables, spices, etc.), and so keep her business open and be able to gain a larger number of customers that will allow her to improve her sales as well as her income.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of plants and kitchen supplies (chicken, meat, vegetables, spices, etc.).

loans.name: Liliam Del Carmen

texts.es: Lilian tiene 32 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 8 años y 1 mes de edad. Lilian es una mujer muy trabajadora, luchadora y responsable quien se dedica a la venta de pollos y huevos desde hace más de 5 años. Lilian desea invertir en su negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos y desea mantenerlo activo y llegar a más clientes. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de pollos de engorde y huevos.
texts.en: Lilian is 32 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and their two children (ages 8 years and 1 month).  Lilian is a hardworking, ambitious, and responsible woman.  She has worked selling chicken and eggs for more than 5 years.  Lilian wants to invest in her business since it is her main source of income.  She wants to keep it active and reach more customers.  For this reason, she is asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in buying meat chickens and eggs.

loans.use: buy meat chickens and eggs to sell.

loans.name: Yesenia Elizabeth

texts.es: Yesenia tiene 37 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 11 años, 5 años y 2 años de edad. Yesenia  posee una mini tienda en la cual comercializa variedad de productos de primera necesidad como: azúcar, frijoles, aceite, huevos, arroz, macarrones, pan dulce, etc. Además, también vende deliciosas pupusas las cuales con muy demandadas por sus clientes. Ella desea reconstruir el cuarto de la cocina ya que se encuentra deteriorado y cuando llueve el agua se filtra dañando sus pocas pertenencias.  Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera para proceder lo antes posible a la construcción.
texts.en: Yesenia is 37 years old. She lives in her own home with her life's companion and their three children, aged 11, 5 and 2. Yesenia has a mini-store where she sells a variety of staple products such as sugar, beans, oil, eggs, rice, pasta, sweet bread, etc. In addition, she also sells delicious pupusas, which are much in demand from her customers. She wants to rebuild the kitchen, which is very deteriorated. When it rains, water filters through and damages her few belongings. With the amount she has asked for, she will buy galvanized sheeting and wood to start construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to re-build her kitchen.

loans.name: Blanca Fredesbinda

texts.es: Blanca tiene 45 años de edad y reside junto a sus dos hijos de 12 años y 15 años de edad. Blanca ha logrado establecer un pequeño vivero en el cual comercializa variedad de plantas ornamentales desde hace mucho tiempo. Además, tiene una venta de accesorios de carro y desea invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de plantas y artículos de carro para contar con mayor capacidad y poder satisfacer a un mayor número de clientes que le permita mejorar sus ventas. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio y así poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Blanca is 45 years old and lives along with her two children who are 12 and 15 years old. A while ago, Blanca managed to establish a small nursery in which she sells a variety of ornamental plants. Additionally, she sells car accessories and wishes to invest in the purchase of a variety of plants and car items for her business in order to have a greater ability to satisfy a greater number of customers which would allow her to improve her sales. This is the reason for which she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in her business and be able to improve her living conditions and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of plants and car accessories.

loans.name: Ngorongoro Group

texts.en:
Emmy is a married woman in her late 30s. She is a mother of one daughter, who is in school. For four years now, Emmy has been managing a business, selling shoes, clothes, and beauty items like necklaces, rings, etc. She opens her business from 08:00am to 10:00pm per working day and is able to make a very good profit.

This is her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. Emmy used the previous loan to buy business stock, including fabrics, shoes and beauty products. She managed to pay back her loan. She managed to earn an extra income, which she used to pay for family food expenses and plow back into the business. Emmy is requesting this new loan, which she will use to buy clothes, shoes and beauty products, to resell. She dreams that one day she will be able to be a big business person.

She will share this loan with her loan group, "Ngorongoro," which totals four members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes and beauty products, to resell.

loans.name: Amy  Demba's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est crée depuis Mai 2007. Il est composé de 5 femmes qui habitent dans la même commune. Elles ont comme activité le petit commerce.

Aissatou qui est a droite de la photo et levant la main droite, est notre est la représentante du groupe.Elle est mariée et âgée de 52 ans.

Avec ce crédit, elle compte s'approvisionner en achetant de l'huile de palme pour une valeur de 300000f, des légumes pour un montant de 125000f et du poisson fumé a 75000f.

Avec son bénéfice elle compte augmenter son épargne et aussi aider son mari dans la prise en charge familiale.
texts.en:
This group was established in May, 2007. It is made up of five women who all live in the same area and all engage in small-scale commerce.

Aissatou, who is on the right in the photo with her hand raised, is the representative of the group. She is married and 52 years old. 

With this loan, she plans to buy palm oil for 300,000 francs, vegetables for 125,000 francs and smoked fish for 75,000 francs.

With her earnings, she will increase her savings and also help her husband with the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Agustin

texts.es:
Agustín, se dedica a vender hot dog, panes con pollo, hamburguesas  y refrescos, su mayor ventaja es que en la zona no posee competencia, realizando esta actividad obtiene los recursos económicos con los que da a su familia una vida digna, es apoyado por su esposa, él es casado y padre de tres hijos de 28, 23 y 18 años de edad.
El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de sillas, mesas, embutidos, carnes, verduras, condimentos aceite, bebidas etc., para mejorar la apariencia del lugar y tener la materia prima para continuar trabajando, aumentar sus ganancias con las cuales cancelara sus cuotas.
Su sueño es tener un establecimiento en el que ofrezca variedad de comida para aumentar su rentabilidad y así mejorar el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Agustín sells hot dogs, chicken sandwiches, hamburgers, and soft drinks. His major advantage is that he has no competition in the area. Therefore, his business can generate the income he needs to provide a decent life for his family. He has the support of his wife. Agustín is married and the father of three children (ages 28, 23, and 18).

The loan he is requesting will be invested in the purchase of chairs, tables, sausages, meat, vegetables, condiments, oil, beverages, and other items. This will help to improve the appearance of his establishment and provide him with the supplies he needs to continue working. As a result, he can increase his earnings and repay this debt.

His dream is to have an establishment where he can offer a variety of food so that he can increase his profitability and improve his family’s lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables, sausages, meat, vegetables, condiments, oil, beverages, and other supplies.

loans.name: Yalgre Group

texts.fr:
MARTINE  est responsable du groupe YALGRE. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 06 enfants. Le plus  âgé a 26ans et le moins âgé a 13ans. 02 vont  à l’école. Elle a 03 personnes en charge.
Mme fait la transformation (dolo ou bière de mil) depuis 19ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. Ses clients sont les  femmes  et hommes.
Mme veut s’acheter 02sacs de sorgho et 03rangées de bois.
Elle veut épargner ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne s’acheter une moto et mieux s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Martine is responsible for the Yalgre group. She is doing well. Married, she is a mother of six children. The eldest is 26 years old and the youngest is 13 years old. Two of the children go to school. Martine has three [additional] people under her care.

Martine has been making dolo, or millet beer, for 19 years. She procures her ingredients from a local market. Her customers are men and women. She wants to buy two sacs of sorghum and three racks of wood.

Martine wants to save her earnings. She aims to buy a motorcycle and to take better care of her family.

loans.use: to buy two sacs of sorghum and 3 racks of wood

loans.name: Roman

texts.en:
Roman is 28 years old and he lives in the village of Vazashen in Tavush region. Roman is not married and he lives with his parents and brother. His brother does construction work in their village and he also goes to Russian Federation for a year for the same work. 

Roman, with his parents, is engaged in farming and through his laborious character, thanks to farming he managed to buy a car for his family and also repaired their house. In his farm Roman has nine cows, a piglet, twenty chickens, two beehives and two geese. On his plot of land Roman cultivates and sells wheat, apples, nuts, cornel (local fruit used for jam), persimmons and also has farm eggs and dairy-products (milk, meat). 

Roman is asking for a loan of 400,000 Armenian drams in order to buy piglets and start swine breeding and also buy some animal fodder for all his livestock.

loans.use: to buy piglets and start swine breeding and also buy some animal fodder for his livestock

loans.name: Villa Real Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socios emprendedores una de ellas es Sudelba mujer de 48 años de edad, casada, desde hace 20 años tiene una pulpería en su domicilio, inicio su negocio vendiendo tamales pisques y chicha helada en fresco, ella misma atiende su negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en  productos de pulpería como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite en bidón, gaseosas variadas, carne de res, carne de pollo, medicamentos populares, sopas maggi etc. María tiene 35 años de edad su negocio es la venta de tamal pisques y chicha helada, Inés tiene 28 años su negocio es la venta y compra de cosechas de tamarindo y Celeste tiene 21 años de edad y su negocio es la de un mini cafetín.
texts.en:
This group consists of four enterprising members. One of them is a woman named Sudelba. She is 48 years old, married, and has been managing a grocery store in her home for the past 20 years. Sudelba started her business by selling “tamales pisques” (tamales stuffed with beans) and freshly chilled “chicha” (a traditional beverage made from corn). She continues to operate her business. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of grocery products such as rice, beans, sugar, drums of oil, a variety of sodas, beef, chicken, popular medicines, Maggi soup mixes, and other items.

María is 35 years old and also has a business of selling “tamales pisques” and chilled “chicha”. Inés is 28 years old and has a business of buying and selling harvested tamarind. Celeste is 21 years old and her business is operating a small café.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Kathina

texts.en:
Kathina is a 46-year-old woman with two children, aged 17 and 12 years old, whom she supports. This is her second loan, this time for Ksh. 60,000. She was introduced to Vision Fund Kenya  by a Vision Fund officer. She has a retail shop, and her business is located at Msoloni.  She has been in this business for eight  years and she earns a monthly income of Ksh.12,000. 

Kathina is planning to use the loan to purchase more stock to sell to her customers. She will use the profit to expand the business. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to expand her business and educate her children.

loans.use: To purchase more grocery stock to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Munira

texts.en: Munira is 53 years old and has four children, aged 25, 22, 18 and 16 years, whom she supports. This is her fifth loan, and she is borrowing KES 70,000. She was introduced to Vision Fund Kenya by the Vision Fund officer. She has rental houses, which are located at Ganda. She built these houses 13 years ago, and from them she earns a monthly income of KES 18,000. She’s planning to use the loan to renovate the houses. She will use the profit to build more rental houses. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to build more rental houses and educate her children.

loans.use: to renovate the houses that she rents out to tenants

loans.name: Lazmus

texts.en:
Lazmus is aged 38 and lives in Hoima, Uganda. He brews waragi and stocks it for sale. He earns additional income from farming and rentals. He hopes to have a more modernized system of brewing liquor in future but unpredictable climate changes affect his business because the raw materials are seasonal, leading to low productivity hence low income.
 
Lazmus wants a loan to buy more waragi to sell.

loans.use: to buy more local brew (waragi) to sell.

loans.name: Maro

texts.en:
This nice lady Maro is 42 years old and she lives in Ijevan city. Maro graduated from Yerevan State University, from the faculty of Armenian Language and Literature. Maro at different periods worked at different places. For three years she worked as a radio broadcaster, then she worked as a teacher at the school, and now she works at the Municipality of Ijevan city as a secretary. She has a daughter who now lives and studies in Yerevan. Maro is a very active and artistic person, and, as she says, very often she organizes parties and meetings for her relatives and friends and they all greatly enjoy their time spent together. 

Maro asks for a loan of 400,000 Armenian drams (AMD) since she wants to buy living room furniture for her house, which will make her flat more comfortable for her and her guests and also for her daughter when she will comes back to Ijevan.

loans.use: to buy living room furniture for her house, which will make her flat more comfortable

loans.name: Nzije

texts.en:
Nzije is a married woman, who has been blessed with five, school-going children. She lives at her own house, which has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Nzije has been operating a charcoal-selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and villagers. Her greatest monthly challenge is the high cost of transportation.

She is requesting a loan of KES 30,000, which she will use to purchase more charcoal for resale. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi is a married woman who has seven children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past one year, she has operated a kiosk shop, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She mentioned seasonality and theft as her major challenges. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the KES 30,000 loan, she wants to purchase paraffin, wheat flour and maize flour, for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans, to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase paraffin, wheat flour and maize flour to sell at her kiosk

loans.name: Santos Eustaquia

texts.es: Santos tiene 57 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 13 años y 11 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando en la escuela publica de su localidad. Santos se dedica a la venta de plantas y verduras en el mercado central de su localidad. Santos desea mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia por lo que junto a su compañero de vida trabajan muy duro para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Santos desea invertir en su negocio con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar variedad de plantas y verduras para incrementar su negocio.
texts.en:
Santos is 57 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their children who are 13 and 11 years old. Both children are studying in the local public school. Santos works selling plants and vegetables in the central market near where she lives. Santos hopes to improve the quality of life of her family, and as a result she and her husband work very hard in order to provide for their home. 

Santos would like to invest in her business with the goal of improving her income and quality of life. As a result, she is asking for a loan from Apoyo Integral to buy a variety of plants and vegetables to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy ornamental plants and vegetables for her business

loans.name: Mapenzi

texts.en:
Mapenzi is a 28-year-old woman, married with two children aged 4 and 3 years old whom she supports. This is her first loan of Ksh.10,000. She was introduced to Visionfund Kenya  by a Visionfund officer. She's a fishmonger, and her business is located at Kibaoni. She has been in this business for eight years and she earns a monthly income of Ksh. 4,550.

Mapenzi is planning to use the loan to purchase more fish to sell to her customers. She will use the profit to expand the business. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to expand her business and educate her children.

loans.use: To purchase more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Judy has a clothes-selling business which she has been running for 10 years now. She is 34 years old, married, and together with her spouse she has been blessed with two children. Her spouse also provides additional income.

She will be using this loan to purchase more clothes to sell. She will use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children.

This is her first loan with VisionFund Kenya and her future hopes are to be successful in her business and educate her children to the best level possible.

loans.use: To buy more stock of clothes for resale

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: Cristina tiene 54 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos de 16 años( gemelos) y uno de 18 años de edad quienes a la fecha se encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Cristina se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en la plaza central de su localidad. Tiene más de 7 años de dedicarse al comercio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes quienes cada día la prefieren más. Ella desea mejorar sus ingresos ya que este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y quiere mantenerlo activo ya es lo único que percibe al no contar con el apoyo de su esposo de quien hace algunos años se separó. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de frutas y verduras al por mayor para el negocio.
texts.en:
Cristina is 54 years old and lives in her own house with her three children. They are 16 years old (twins) and 18 years old, all of whom are studying in the local public school. Cristina works selling fruits and vegetables in the central plaza near where she lives. She has been doing so for more than 7 years, and each day she has more and more clients who prefer to buy from her. Cristina hopes to improve her earnings since this business is her main source of income, and she wants to make sure it remains active since she and her husband separated a few years ago and she no longer has his financial support. 

Cristina is asking for this loan from Apoyo Integral in order to buy a variety of wholesale fruits and vegetables for her business.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in bulk for her business

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es: Josefa tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos de 19 años, 15 años, 11 años  y 7 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Josefa se dedica a la venta de plantas y verduras desde hace mucho tiempo en el mercado central de su localidad. Josefa desea invertir en su negocio de venta de plantas y verduras con el fin de satisfacer a un mayor número de clientes que le permitan aumentar sus ventas e ingresos. Josefa solicita este crédito a FUSAI para poder hacer la inversión ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso, pero si con la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Josefa is 36 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their children who are 19, 15, 11, and 7 years old. All of their children are studying in the public school in their community. Josefa has been working for a number of years selling plants and vegetables in the central market near where she lives. Josefa would like to invest in her business in order to satisfy a greater number of clients, which will enable her to improve her sales and income. Josefa is asking for this loan from Apoyo Integral in order to buy more plants and vegetables, since she does not have the available capital to do so without the loan. However, she does have the capacity to pay back the loan as it becomes due.

loans.use: to buy plants and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Noyaa-1 Group

texts.en:
These two individuals are part of the group called Noyaa-1. They are connected through good social and professional ties.

Emmanuel, the representative of the group, is a 59-year-old, married man. He has a 16-year-old child who is schooling. Emmanuel is on the right in the photo.

Emmanuel is in the business of supplying kenkey (cooked maize paste). He is requesting the loan amount of GHS 1800. He will use it to buy two big bags of maize and prepare kenkey, which he will supply to customers. With Emmanuel, his customers are always standing by to be supplied. This is his eighth loan with ID-Ghana and second with Kiva. The resulting income will enable him to pay for food, health care, and education for his child, and to increase his savings.

Emmanuel and Ama, together, will need a total amount of GHS 3200 to expand their businesses.

loans.use: to buy two big bags of maize and prepare kenkey (cooked maize paste), which he will supply to customers.

loans.name: Isaac Otoniel

texts.es:
Otoniel, desde muy joven aprendió a comercializar pescado junto a un primo, con el tiempo su primo emigro al extranjero, actualmente trabaja de manera independiente respaldado por la experiencia adquirida, lo realiza de manera ambulante en las zonas cercanas a su residencia, es casado por el momento no tiene hijos.
El crédito que está solicitando lo necesita para variar la mercadería y ofrecer productos frescos y de buena calidad, comprara variedad pescado y camarones, lo que le ayudara aumentar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos, con los que cancelara su deuda adquirida y mejorar su vida familiar.
Su sueño es tener los recursos económicos para hacer la apertura de una tienda en su casa en la que ofrecerá artículos de primera necesidad.
texts.en:
Otoniel learned how to sell fish as a young man along with one of his cousins. Eventually his cousin moved abroad, so he now works independently as a result of the experience he gained. He goes about his work as a street vendor, traveling through the areas near his home. Otoniel is married but has no children at the moment.

He needs to request a loan so that he can vary his merchandise and offer fresh products that are of good quality. Otoniel will buy a variety of fish and shrimp. This will help to increase his sales and improve his earnings. As a result, he will be able to repay this debt and improve his family’s life.

His dream is to have the financial resources for opening a store in his home where he can sell basic necessities.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fish and shrimp.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, and iron to construct a room

loans.name: Karen Arely

texts.es: Karen tiene 21 años de edad y habita en casa de la madre junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 6 meses de edad. Karen se dedica al comercio de billetes de lotería y lotín desde hace mucho tiempo. La venta ala realiza de forma ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad lo cual le permite llegar a muchas personas que demandan los billetes de lotería y lotín. Su deseo es hacer crecer su negocio dado que desea mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos y como consecuencia su calidad de vida. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de billetes de lotería y lotín al por mayor y de esta forma lograr su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Karen is 21 years old and lives in a house with her mother, husband, and 6 month old son. Karen has been working selling lottery tickets for many years. She sells her tickets in the most populous areas near where she lives, which enables her to reach many people who wish to buy the tickets. Her dream is to grow her business in order to improve her sales, income, and consequently her quality of life. As a result, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI in order to buy more lottery tickets, which will enable her to reach her goal and improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to buy lottery tickets for sale

loans.name: Ana Aracely

texts.es: Ana tiene 23 años de edad  es soltera y habita en casa alquilada junto a su familia. Ana es comerciante de billetes de lotería y es así como desde hace mucho tiempo se gana la vida honradamente y apoya a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Ella desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de billetes de lotería y así poder cubrir una cuota de mercado más grande y poder aumentar sus ventas e ingresos que le permitan mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 23 years old, single, and lives at home with her family in a house that they rent. Ana works selling lottery tickets, and in this way has been earning an honest living for the past few years and helping her family with their home expenses. Ana hopes to improve her living conditions, which is why she is asking for this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in her business and buy more lottery tickets. This will allow her to satisfy a greater market demand, and improve her sales and earnings. She will then be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy lottery tickets for sale

loans.name: Kitupa

texts.en:
Kitupa is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family.

For the past two years, she has operated a shop kiosk business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She mentioned price fluctuation as her major challenge. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the KES 20,000, she wants to purchase wheat flour, maize flour and paraffin for resale. She decided to join Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, maize flour and paraffin for resale
